Name: Lewd Girls, Leave Me Alone! I Just Want to Play Video Games and Watch Anime! - Hentai Edition
About the game: You want to get a girlfriend, but something always stands in your way. The moment you go on a date, you get notifications about the new episode of your favorite anime, or the release of a long-awaited game, or the unannounced stream of a VTuber. You know where your priorities lie so you need to ditch your date as quickly and as painlessly as possible or... give in to the temptation? Multiple Game Modes: Streamer Friendly Mode : Don't be afraid to play our game on Twitch and YouTube! All 18+ content is marked. Dating Simulator : Make dialogue choices!
